mapper.update: update basket set quantity = #{quantity} where email = #{email} and type1 = #{type1} and type2 = #{type2} and modelName1 = #{modelName1} and pd_num = #{pd_num}
mapper.delete: delete basket where email = #{email} and type1 = #{type1} and type2 = #{type2} and modelName1 = #{modelName1} and pd_num = #{pd_num}
mapper.select: select email,num,type1,type2,type3,pd_num,modelName1,imageUrl,price,quantity from basket where email = #{email} and type1 = #{type1} and type2 = #{type2} and modelName1 = #{modelName1} and pd_num = #{pd_num}
select email,num,type1,type2,type3,pd_num,modelName1,imageUrl,price,quantity from basket where email = #{email} order by num
select count(*) from basket where email = #{email}
select sum(quantity) from basket where email = #{email}
select sum(price*quantity) from basket where email = #{email}
